summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the City's execution of an Exchange Agreement between the City of Seattle and the State of Washington and an Agreement and Quit Claim Deed, providing for the exchange of certain City (Water Department) real property for certain State owned real property pertinent to the relocation of the City's West Seattle Pipeline in conjunction with the State's construction of the I-5 Freeway and authorizing the City's acceptance of certain real property located in Sections 3 and 10, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and in C.D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition for Water and Lighting Utility purposes.
